Aaron Burdick

English Conversation & TOEIC

I'm originally from America but I've been living in Japan for about four years now. I graduated with a bachelors degree in International Business in America and moved to Japan where I have taught at various schools. From Aeon eikaiwa to Waseda University, I've taught at places all over Japan and America.

I've taught various students throughout the world. From Bolivia, Vietnam, Japan, China, Korea, and other countries. It's my pleasure to teach people English no matter what background they have or what level of English they have.

I hope to have a great time teaching English to you!

いつでも新宿でお待ちしています！ぜひお越しくださいませ！
